info.name: Infinite Hearts
info.description: This is a result of procrastination

renderpass.code:
#define R iResolution.xy
#define t iTime
#define f(i) 2.*cos(i.y+acos(cos(2.*i.x))/(3.))*sin(i.x)-2.5*sin(t)
void mainImage(out vec4 C,in vec2 U){vec2 k=U/R-.5;vec2 j=U/R.y*20.-vec2(t);vec4 d=vec4(1.,.5,.5,1.);if(abs(f(j))<1.){d+=1.;}d/=sqrt(.65-.9*length(.55*k));C=d;}
renderpass.name: Image
